background.text: Meet my boss a cybersecurity enthusiast and full-stack developer with a passion for exploring systems, discovering vulnerabilities (ethically), and creating stronger, smarter solutions. With hands-on experience in offensive security and IoT, they’re always ready for the next challenge.
background.largeContent:
About Me

Juster B. Ube

Cybersecurity Researcher & Full-Stack Developer

Personal Information

Age: 20
Location: Davao del Sur, Philippines (Remote)
Email: juster.juzterube@gmail.com

A dedicated cybersecurity researcher and full-stack developer with a focus on secure, efficient, and scalable solutions. Passionate about continuous learning and driven by a deep curiosity for technology and innovation.

Professional Interests

  • Cybersecurity research and Capture the Flag (CTF) competitions
  • Internet of Things (IoT) development and firmware analysis
  • Linux system engineering and task automation
  • Collaborating on open-source security projects

Personal Motto

“What they call impossible is just something no one had the courage to attempt.”

education.text: A self-taught computer science professional focused on practical security and development. Learn more in the side panel.
education.largeContent:
Education & Learning Path

Self-Taught Expertise

Ongoing since 2018

Complementary to BS in Information Technology | Focus: Computer Science Fundamentals, Security, DevOps, Reverse Engineering

  • Core Topics: Networking, Web Exploitation, Embedded Systems
  • Personal Projects: Custom Security tools, IoT security toolkit, automation scripts

Formal Academic Background

  • Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (BSIT): Davao del sur State College, Currently pursuing (Expected Graduation: 2027)
  • Senior High School: Mary Mediatrix of All Graces Academy (CSS Track, 2020–2022)
  • Junior High School: Soong National High School (2016–2020)
  • Elementary: Binaton Elementary School (2010–2016)

Graduated with honors, demonstrating a strong foundation in CSS and a sustained commitment to technology, programming, and analytical problem-solving.

Key Learnings and Achievements

  • CTF Competitions: HackTheBox, PicoCTF, Google CTF
  • Contributions: Bug bounties, open-source security tools, IoT firmware research

experiences.text: From hardware firmware contributions to CTF achievements and community collaborations, his journey showcases a wide range of hands-on experience. Take a closer look in the side panel.
experiences.largeContent:
Professional Experiences

Contributor & Collaborator — Bruce Firmware

Ongoing since 2022

  • Resolved critical bugs and optimized core modules to improve stability and performance.
  • Implemented features such as enhanced network scanning and user-facing UI improvements.
  • Collaborated with maintainers through GitHub PRs, issue triage, and code reviews.

Security Researcher — Piso WiFi Community

Field research and responsible disclosure (2021 — Present)

  • Discovered multiple software vulnerabilities including authentication bypass issues in public captive-portal/Piso WiFi systems.
  • Performed controlled verification, documented exploits and impact, and followed responsible disclosure procedures with vendors and community stakeholders.
  • Worked with maintainers to verify fixes, propose patches, and validate mitigations to prevent real-world abuse.
  • Authored reproducible proof-of-concept reports and coordinated coordination timelines for safe remediation.

CTF Participant & Competitor

Multiple events, 2021 — Present

  • Reverse engineering and malware analysis to extract flags and understand payload behavior.
  • Network forensics and traffic analysis to identify covert channels and hidden payloads.
  • Developed exploits for buffer overflows and web vulnerabilities; conducted recon with tools like Nmap and Gobuster.

Facebook Chatbot Community Contributor

2020 — 2022

  • Published tutorials on Node.js integrations, API handling, and best practices for bot persistence.
  • Moderated discussions, assisted debugging, and contributed code for MongoDB persistence and third-party API hooks.

achievements.text: From building AI chatbots to uncovering high-severity vulnerabilities, here’s a snapshot of his most notable projects and research. More details can be found in the side panel.
achievements.largeContent:

2020

Built an intelligent chatbot for automated interactions, handling queries with NLP.

Node.js MongoDB Google APIs

2020

Created a quick tool for disposable emails, scraping and generating on-demand.

Python

2021

Developed open-source firmware for WiFi mapping and scanning on embedded devices.

C/C++ ESP32

Web Vulnerability Disclosure - Pisofi

2021

Reported and helped patch an authentication bypass flaw in a popular service.

Burp Suite OWASP

High-Severity RCE Disclosure

2023 | CVSS: 9.8

Uncovered and responsibly disclosed a remote code execution vuln in a major server app.

Metasploit Python Exploits
